alert.note: Alert for Autauga; Dallas; Lowndes (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 26 at 6:58AM CDT until March 26 at 8:00AM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: The National Weather Service in Birmingham has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Autauga County in central Alabama... Northeastern Lowndes County in south central Alabama... Northeastern Dallas County in south central Alabama... * Until 800 AM CDT. * At 657 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Valley Grande, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Prattville, Selma, Millbrook, Valley Grande, Selmont-West Selmont, Deatsville, Autaugaville, White Hall, Booth, Mulberry, Vida Junction, Gardner Island, Paul M Grist State Park, Autauga County Airport, Memorial Stadium, Burnsville, Dallas County Horse Arena, Potter Station, Summerfield and Valley Creek Junction. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until noon CDT for central, south central and east central Alabama. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
